plot: Panic is the story of a man that has a life without meaning and suffers a nightmare in which he will encounter his inner self and his darkness.
title: Pánico
plot_es: Panic is the story of a man that has a life without meaning and suffers a nightmare in which he will encounter his inner self and his darkness.
plot_en: Panic is the story of a man that has a life without meaning and suffers a nightmare in which he will encounter his inner self and his darkness.
